v1.headline: Co-founder & CDO @FundBrave | UI/UX Designer focused on human-centered design | Mentor & Design Leader
v1.about:
You can call me Kosi (pronounced as spelled)

My full name is Kosisochukwu, beautiful, but a bit much to say
 
I’ve learned that small changes, like shortening my name,  

helps people feel more comfortable and connected  

That’s the same energy I bring into design:

Less friction, more human-centered experiences

Because great ideas often fail at launch

not for lack of vision

but from poor user experience

and that’s how things break down 

But that’s why I'm here

_______

As a UI/UX designer, 
 
I help teams turn complexity into clarity
  
I design interfaces that make people say,  

“Ohh, now that makes sense.”

One of my favorite wins?

FundBrave, a social fundraising platform  

that earned the Numbers Protocol Award for Social Good in 2024

Proof that when purpose meets design, impact follows

_______

When I’m not designing for clients,  

I’m guiding beginners into confident UI/UX pros

If you’ve ever Googled  

“what’s the difference between UI and UX?”

and felt even more confused

yeah, I’ve been there

Now, I help beginners go from “I’m confused” to “I got this” 

with structure, clarity, and real growth

If you’re building something impactful,
  
or learning to design with meaning 

I’d love to connect
  
I'm just a DM away 

and yes, I’m actually super nice.

Don’t be shy, come say hi
